skills.label: Create a document
items: Create a blank document, create a blank document using a template, open a pdf in word for editing, insert text from a file or external source

skills.label: Navigate through a document
items: Search for text, insert hyperlinks, create bookmarks, move to a specific location or object in a document

skills.label: Format a document
items: Modify page setup, apply document themes, apply document style sets, insert headers and footers, insert page numbers, format page background elements

skills.label: Customize options and views for documents
items: Change document views, customize views by using zoom settings, customize the quick access toolbar, split the window, add document properties, show or hide formatting symbols

skills.label: Print and save documents
items: Modify print settings, save documents in alternative file formats, print all or part of a document, inspect a document for hidden properties or personal information, inspect a document for accessibility issues, inspect a document for compatibility issues

skills.label: Insert text and paragraphs
items: Find and replace text
Cut, copy, and paste text
Replace text by using autocorrect
Insert special characters

skills.label: Format text and paragraphs
items: Apply font formatting, apply formatting by using format painter, set line and paragraph spacing and indentation, clear formatting, apply a text highlight color to text selections, apply built-in styles to text, change text to wordart

skills.label: Order and group text and paragraphs
items: Format text in multiple columns
Insert page, section, or column breaks
Change page setup options for a section

skills.label: Create a table
items: Convert text to tables, convert tables to text, create a table by specifying rows and columns, apply table styles

skills.label: Modify a table
items: Sort table data
Configure cell margins and spacing
Merge and split cells
Resize tables, rows, and columns
Split tables
Configure a repeating row header

skills.label: Create and modify a list
items: Create a numbered or bulleted list, change bullet characters or number formats for a list level, define a custom bullet character or number format, increase or decrease list levels, restart or continue list numbering, set starting number value

skills.label: Create and manage reference markers
items: Insert footnotes and endnotes, modify footnote and endnote properties, create bibliography citation sources, modify bibliography citation sources, insert citations for bibliographies, insert figure and table captions, modify caption properties

skills.label: Create and manage simple references
items: Insert a standard table of contents, update a table of contents, insert a cover page

skills.label: Insert graphic elements
items: Insert shapes, insert pictures, insert a screen shot or screen clipping, insert text boxes

skills.label: Format graphic elements
items: Apply artistic effects, apply picture effects, remove picture backgrounds, format objects, apply a picture style, wrap text around objects, position objects, add alternative text to objects for accessibility

skills.label: Insert and format SmartArt graphics
items: Create a smartart graphic, format a smartart graphic, modify smartart graphic content
